text: The Episcopal Church (TEC) is a member church of the worldwide Anglican Communion. It is based in the United States with additional dioceses elsewhere. It is a mainline Christian denomination divided into nine ecclesiastical provinces. The presiding bishop of the Episcopal Church is Sean Rowe. the Episcopal Church had 1,835,931 baptized members, of whom 1,676,349 were in the United States. it was the nation's 14th largest denomination. Note: The number of members given here is the total number of baptized members in 2012 (cf. Baptized Members by Province and Diocese 2002â€“2013). ==References== Category:Anglicanism Category:Christian organizations based in the United States
title: Episcopal Church (United States)
